entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
